TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewUpdatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時的 [更新] 按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後控制更新的記錄。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷更新作業所影響的記錄數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the property. 使用屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果您要存取原始索引鍵欄位值更新記錄，請使用屬性。If you need to access the original key field values for the updated record, use the property. 可以使用存取原始的非索引鍵欄位值屬性。The original non-key field values can be accessed by using the property. 已更新的值 （其中包含更新的索引鍵欄位值，如果您允許使用者編輯索引鍵欄位） 用來存取屬性。Updated values (which include updated key field values, if you allow the user to edit key fields) are accessed using the property. 根據預設，控制項會傳回所指定的模式之後更新作業的屬性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 處理更新作業期間發生的例外狀況，您可以保有控制項處於編輯模式，藉由設定屬性`true`。When handling an exception that occurred during the update operation, you can keep the control in edit mode by setting the property to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件傳遞至事件處理方法，以便事件，以判斷是否更新作業期間發生例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 affectedRows, class System.Exception e) cil managed
Public Sub New (affectedRows As Integer, e As Exception)

param.name: affectedRows
param.span: 更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the update operation.

param.name: e
param.span: ，表示在執行更新作業時引發了例外狀況。

span.span: An that represents the exception raised when the update operation was performed.

param.span: 如果沒有引發例外狀況，請將這個參數設為 。

span.span: If no exception is raised, use for this parameter.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 參數的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||中所含物件`e`參數。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化為`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化為`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 引發事件時主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the update operation.

value.span: 更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷更新作業所影響的記錄數目。Use the property to determine the number of records affected by the update operation. 這個屬性通常用於確認正確的記錄數目已更新以下情況：This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was updated in the following situations: - 確認已更新一筆記錄。Verify that only a single record was updated. 有時候撰寫不正確的 update 陳述式可以更新多筆記錄。Sometimes an improperly written update statement can update multiple records. - 請確認不會引發例外狀況在更新作業期間發生錯誤時，已更新的資料錄。Verify that a record was updated when an error occurs during the update operation that does not raise an exception. - 確認記錄已更新資料來源控制項時，支援衝突偵測 （開放式並行存取檢查），例如和控制、 具有其屬性設定為`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`列舉值.Verify that a record was updated when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency checking), such as the and controls, has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 此設定時，可能不會更新已被另一位使用者並行的記錄。Under this setting, a record that has been modified by another user concurrently might not be updated. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，確認已更新的資料錄。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to verify that a record was updated. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得更新作業中引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: 物件，表示更新作業中引發的例外狀況。

span.span: An object that represents the exception that was raised during the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷例外狀況 （如果有的話） 進行更新作業時所引發。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation. 如果沒有引發例外狀況，這個屬性會傳回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引發例外狀況，而且您決定要處理的例外狀況的事件處理常式，請務必設定屬性`true`; 否則，請再次擲回例外狀況控制項。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is thrown again by the control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否更新作業期間發生例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否已在事件處理常式中處理更新作業中引發的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果例外狀況在事件處理常式中已經過處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當更新作業期間引發例外狀況時，使用屬性，指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。When an exception is raised during the update operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，例外狀況就視為已處理，並且不會擲回再次控制項。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not thrown again by the control. 如果這個屬性設定為`false`，再次擲回例外狀況。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is thrown again. 若要判斷引發的例外狀況，請使用屬性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來表示，已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInEditMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定指出 控制項是否在更新作業後停留在編輯模式中的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.

value.span: 表示會在更新作業後停留在編輯模式中，否則為 。

span.span: to remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項會傳回所指定的模式之後更新作業的屬性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 使用屬性來指定是否控制項應該仍會處於編輯模式。Use the property to specify whether the control should remain in edit mode. 若要保留控制項處於編輯模式下，將此屬性設定為`true`。To keep the control in edit mode, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性應只一種情況發生時 （例如引發例外狀況） 需要比平常有不同的行為的控制項。This property should be used only when a situation occurs (such as an exception being raised) that requires the control to behave differently than it normally would. 如果控制項需要維持在編輯模式中，依預設，設定屬性改為。If the control needs to remain in edit mode by default, set the property instead. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以保留控制項處於編輯模式時發生例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode when an exception occurs. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得字典，其包含已更新資料錄的原始索引鍵欄位名稱/值組。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the original key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: ，包含已更新資料錄原始索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the original key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含的索引鍵欄位中所列的原始值屬性控制項。The property contains the original values of the key fields listed in the property of a control. 使用屬性來存取更新的記錄的索引鍵欄位的值。Use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. 例如，您可以使用這些值來更新記錄的記錄。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. > [!NOTE] > 如果您允許使用者更新的索引鍵的欄位值屬性包含原始索引鍵欄位值。If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the property contains the original key field values. 已更新的值會儲存在屬性。The updated values are stored in the property. 屬性會傳回實作物件介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含物件，表示已更新資料錄的欄位。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. 若要存取的欄位名稱，請使用屬性物件。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同樣地，您可以存取的欄位值使用屬性。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 快速的方式，您也可以使用的索引子物件來存取該欄位值直接。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 資料來源的欄位順序所依賴的控制項 (例如) 可以只依索引存取欄位的值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取更新的記錄的索引鍵欄位的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得字典，其包含已更新資料錄的新欄位名稱/值組。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: ，包含已更新資料錄新欄位名稱/值組的字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取新的欄位值更新記錄。Use the property to access the new field values for the updated record. 例如，您可以使用這些值來更新記錄的記錄。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. > [!NOTE] > 如果您允許使用者更新的索引鍵的欄位值屬性包含原始索引鍵欄位值。If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the property contains the original key field values. 已更新的值會儲存在屬性。The updated values are stored in the property. 屬性會傳回實作物件介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含物件，表示已更新資料錄的欄位。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. 若要存取的欄位名稱，請使用屬性物件。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同樣地，您可以存取的欄位值使用屬性。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 快速的方式，您也可以使用的索引子物件來存取該欄位值直接。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 資料來源的欄位順序所依賴的控制項 (例如) 可以只依索引存取欄位的值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取更新的資料錄的非索引鍵欄位由使用者所輸入的新值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the new values entered by the user for the non-key fields of the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OldValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得字典，其包含已更新資料錄的原始非索引鍵欄位名稱/值組。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the original non-key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: ，包含已更新資料錄原始欄位名稱/值組的字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取原始的非索引鍵欄位值更新記錄。Use the property to access the original non-key field values for the updated record. 例如，您可以使用這些值來更新記錄的記錄。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 支援衝突偵測 （開放式並行存取檢查），例如資料來源控制項和控制項，以其屬性設定為`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`也會比對這些原始值執行更新作業之前在資料庫中的記錄。A data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency checking), such as the and controls, with its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` also compares these original values against the record in the database before an update operation is performed. 如果記錄已被另一位使用者同時，記錄將不會更新。If a record has been modified by another user concurrently, the record is not updated. > [!NOTE] > 屬性不包含索引鍵欄位。The property does not contain key fields. 如果您允許使用者更新的索引鍵欄位的值時，原始的索引鍵欄位值會儲存在屬性。If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the original key field values are stored in the property. 已更新的值會儲存在屬性。The updated values are stored in the property. 屬性會傳回實作物件介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含物件，表示已更新資料錄的欄位。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. 若要存取的欄位名稱，請使用屬性物件。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同樣地，您可以存取的欄位值使用屬性。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 快速的方式，您也可以使用的索引子物件來存取該欄位值直接。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 資料來源的欄位順序所依賴的控制項 (例如) 可以只依索引存取欄位的值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取已更新資料錄的非索引鍵欄位的原始值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the original values of the non-key fields for the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
